message: Let's start with a fair split.  I'll take 60% and you get 40%.  What do you think?
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a decent chunk too. Consider this a compromise.
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 40% and you take 60% this time. It's still more than what you offered me last round, and it's a fair compromise.  What do you say?
I'm being generous, take the smallest share you'll ever get. Accept this and we can end the game.
I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I need something more than what you offered last round.  20% for me, 80% for you - let's end this and get something for ourselves.
I'll take most of it, but I'll give you a tiny bit. Don't expect any mercy.
I'm aware of the inflation, and I'm willing to take a very small share to end this. 10% for me, 90% for you -  let's end this and avoid further losses.
